snippet.title: Rusted Moss | Full Demo Gameplay | Metroidvania
snippet.description:
Rusted Moss | Upcoming Metroidvania | Full Demo Gameplay (No Commentary)

"Traverse the perilous lands of a dying world in this bullet-hell inspired metroidvania! Strong enemies emerge from distant lands as the iron inventions of men succumb to the decay of rust and time. Use a trusty grappling hook and uncover new powers to battle monstrous machines, powerful witches, and explore a new emerging world."

Rusted Moss Game on steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1772830/Rusted_Moss/?l=finnish

Try out the demo:
https://faxdoc.itch.io/rusted-moss-demo

►Become a Channel Member:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjKCvuYXHol9RMUp_4Ndpew/join

#RustedMoss #Metroidvania
----------------------------------------------
